titles.title: To prohibit a Federal official from establishing, extending, maintaining, implementing, or enforcing a moratorium on evictions unless explicitly authorized by Federal statute, and for other purposes.
RENTAL Act
RENTAL Act
Reversing Executive Negligence Towards American Laws Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Reversing Executive Negligence Towards American Laws Act or the RENTAL Act
This bill prohibits a federal official from establishing, extending, maintaining, implementing, or enforcing a moratorium on evictions, unless the official has specific federal statutory authority.
